short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension that provides random art prompts to help artists overcome creative blocks.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Are you an artist struggling with creative blocks? Do you want to improve your craft and try out new art styles? Look no further than Art Spark! This incredible tool helps artists overcome obstacles and unleash their full potential. With Art Spark, you'll have access to a variety of prompts to get your creativity flowing. Don't let creative blocks hold you back any longer. Give Art Spark a try and take your art to the next level!
